snippet.title: Digital Monster   D Project - Bandai Wonderswan Color - Gameplay 🎮
snippet.description:
...a little gameplay of this fabulous retro game!

Retro Games Encyclopedia  ...simple unforgettable gameplay.

╔════════════════╗
   🎮 Please subscribe! 🎮
╚════════════════╝

This project was born with the intention of becoming over time a source of knowledge and an archive of all the retro games, we want to offer the user the opportunity to find a small example of any existing video game by creating a vast video encyclopedia.

If you like our project and you think that creating an archive of more games on various platforms can have fun and be a good idea, please show us your support by subscribing to the channel and continuing to follow us to see new content.

Thank you! :)
